Name: Moondream
Ingredients: 5 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with peach wedge on rim.
Review: Reminiscent of a delicately peach-flavoured Dry Martini.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Thomas Waugh at Death & Co. in Manhattan, New York City.
Nutrition: One serving of Moondream contains 168 calories
